remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供一种灵活的方式，在行和列中显示的数据集合。The control provides a flexible way to display a collection of data in rows and columns. 包括内置的列类型和用于承载自定义内容的模板列。The includes built-in column types and a template column for hosting custom content. 内置的行类型包括一个可用于显示在单元格值下方的其他内容的下拉菜单的详细信息部分。The built-in row type includes a drop-down details section that you can use to display additional content below the cell values. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 若要将绑定对数据、 设置属性实现。To bind the to data, set the property to an implementation. 数据网格中的每一行绑定到数据源中的一个对象，并在数据网格中的每一列绑定到数据对象的属性。Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object. 为了使用户界面添加到或从源数据中，删除项时自动更新必须绑定到集合可实现接口，如。In order for the user interface to update automatically when items are added to or removed from the source data, the must be bound to a collection that implements the interface, such as an . 若要自动反映属性更改，源集合中的对象必须实现接口。To automatically reflect property changes, the objects in the source collection must implement the interface. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md). ## 列Columns 默认情况下，控件生成列自动设置时属性。By default, the control generates columns automatically when you set the property. 生成的列的类型取决于列中的数据类型。The type of column that is generated depends on the type of data in the column. 下表列出生成的列类型。The following table lists the generated columns types. |生成的列类型Generated Column Type|数据类型Data Type| |---------------------------|---------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| 下图显示每个列类型。The following illustration shows each of the column types. ![与所有四种默认列类型的 DataGrid](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "与所有四种默认列类型的 DataGrid")![DataGrid with all four default column types](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid with all four default column types") 自动生成列时，你可以处理事件自定义或取消列添加到之前。When columns are auto-generated, you can handle the event to customize or cancel columns before they are added to the . 如果你将添加用户定义的列和自动生成列，首先添加的用户定义的列。If you add both user-defined columns and auto-generated columns to the , the user-defined columns are added first. 若要重新排列的列的显示顺序，可以设置各个列的属性。To rearrange the display order of the columns, you can set the property for individual columns. 你可以通过设置阻止自动生成列属性`false`。You can prevent automatic column generation by setting the property to `false`. 这很有用，如果你想要创建和显式配置的所有列。This is useful if you want to create and configure all columns explicitly. 使用类型来定义自定义列，如果内置的列类型不能满足你的需求。Use the type to define a custom column if the built-in column types do not meet your needs. 类型提供了和使您能够指定用于显示和编辑模式的内容模板的属性。The type provides and properties that enable you to specify content templates for both display and editing modes. 例如，你可以定义的自定义列的日期。For example, you could define a custom column for dates. 可以定义显示的日期和可以定义控件编辑的日期。The could define a to display a date, and the could define a control to edit the date. 你可以使用要以编程方式添加、 插入、 删除和在运行时更改控件中的任何列集合。You can use the collection to programmatically add, insert, remove, and change any columns in the control at run time. 检查属性来确定列是否为自动生成或用户定义。Check the property to determine whether a column is auto generated or user defined. 自动生成的列将自动添加，已删除或重新生成时更改。Auto-generated columns will be automatically added, removed, or regenerated when the changes. ## 选择Selection 默认情况下，当用户单击中的单元格选择整行，用户可以选择多个行。By default, the entire row is selected when a user clicks a cell in a , and a user can select multiple rows. 你可以设置属性来指定用户可选择单元格和 / 或整行。You can set the property to specify whether a user can select cells, full rows, or both. 设置属性来指定多个行或单元格可以选择、，还是仅单一行或单元格。Set the property to specify whether multiple rows or cells can be selected, or only single rows or cells. 你可以获取有关从选择的单元格信息属性。You can get information about the cells that are selected from the property. 你可以获取有关所选内容中为其已更改的单元格信息的事件。You can get information about cells for which selection has changed in the of the event. 调用或方法以编程方式选择或取消选择所有单元格。Call the or methods to programmatically select or unselect all cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认键盘和鼠标 DataGrid 控件中的行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-behavior-in-the-datagrid-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Behavior in the DataGrid Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-behavior-in-the-datagrid-control.md). ## 分组、 排序和筛选Grouping, Sorting, and Filtering 默认情况下，您可以进行中的项排序通过单击列标题。By default, you can sort items in a by clicking the column header. 你可以自定义排序通过处理事件。You can customize sorting by handling the event. 若要取消默认排序，属性`true`。To cancel the default sort, set the property to `true`. 你也可以进行排序的源数据中显示之前。You can also sort the source data before it is displayed in the . 组、 排序和筛选器中的数据到，你将绑定到支持这些操作的实现。To group, sort, and filter data in the , you bind the to an implementation that supports these operations. 然后执行集合视图上的操作。You then perform the operations on the collection view. 项中的分组时，你可以定义，它指定每个组的外观。When items are grouped in the , you can define a that specifies the appearance of each group. 你将应用通过将其添加到集合。You apply the by adding it to the collection of the . 如果你有多个级别的分组，你可以将不同样式应用到每个分组级别。If you have multiple levels of grouping, you can apply different styles to each group level. 在其中定义的顺序应用样式。Styles are applied in the order in which they are defined. 有关详细信息，请参阅[How to： 组、 排序和 DataGrid 控件中的筛选器数据](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control.md). ## 编辑Editing 默认情况下，你可以编辑项直接在。By default, you can edit items directly in the . 若要确保编辑就可提交，并且是否正确，取消中的对象必须实现接口。To guarantee that edits can be committed and canceled correctly, the objects in the must implement the interface. 或者，您可以设置属性`true`禁用中编辑。Alternatively, you can set the property to `true` to disable editing in the . 内置支持以下编辑命令：The has built-in support for the following editing commands: |命令Command|默认输入的绑定Default Input Binding|
